pJointLimit Class Reference
[Joints]

Describes a joint limit. pJointLimit is registered as custom structure pJLimit and can be accessed or modified through parameter operations.
. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • float hardness
  • float value
  • float restitution

Detailed Description

Describes a joint limit. pJointLimit is registered as custom structure pJLimit and can be accessed or modified through parameter operations.
.

This is used for ball joints.

See also:
PJBall.

Member Data Documentation

float pJointLimit::hardness

[not yet implemented!] Limit can be made softer by setting this to less than 1. Default = 0.0f;

float pJointLimit::value

The angle / position beyond which the limit is active. Default = 0.0f;

float pJointLimit::restitution

The limit bounce. Default = 0.0f;
